psd_imported:
PSD imported!

If the armature is incorrect, please check out the [PSD Rigging](user-docs/psd.html) section in the user documentation.
vert_limit:
Cannot delete vertex.

Meshes must have at least 4 vertices.
indices_limit:
Cannot delete triangle.

Meshes must have at least 2 triangles.
import_unrecognized:
File could not be recognized.

Supported files:
- SkelForm armature (.skf)
- Photoshop Document (.psd)
import_err: There was an error reading the file:
donating:
If you liked using SkelForm, a [donation](https://ko-fi.com/retropaintt) is highly appreciated!

The donation will be through ko-fi.com.

Thank you for using SkelForm!

startup.empty_recent_files:
Start from scratch, import an SKF/PSD file, or try a sample from the options on the left.

New here? Check out the Starter Guide on the right to be guided on your first rig.
startup.early_access_warning:
WARNING:
SkelForm is a work in progress.
Expect bugs, crashes, and breaking changes on newer versions.
startup.web_note: Start from scratch, import an SKF/PSD file, or try a sample below:
startup.skellington_sample_desc: A character with rubberhose-style limbs, utilizing mesh deformation.
startup.skellina_sample_desc: A character with simple, 2-bone limbs. Does not contain meshes.
startup.error_update:
Something went wrong.

Please check your internet connection and try again.

If the problem persists, it might be on SkelForm's side.

[All Versions Page](https://github.com/Retropaint/SkelForm/releases)
startup.error_ffmpeg:
ffmpeg is not available.

Please ensure it is installed and in your $PATH.

styles_modal.heading: Styles â„¹
styles_modal.heading_desc:
Styles allow hotswapping of textures to create multiple outfits/skins.

The first active style containing the bone's texture name will be used.
styles_modal.style_preview_empty:
No textures in this style.

Click to select and add to it.
styles_modal.texture_desc:
Drag to a bone to set this as it's texture.
Drag above/below another texture to change order.
styles_modal.assigned_textures_desc:
Assign textures to bones here.

If this style is inactive, bones will switch to a texture of the same name from the first active style top-down.
styles_modal.same_name: There is already a texture with the same name in this style.
styles_modal.styles_empty:
All textures must be in a style.

Styles are batches of textures, used to represent outfits or skins.

To add a style, click 'New' above.
styles_modal.textures_empty:
This style's textures will appear here.

Click 'Import' above to import an image to add as a texture.
styles_modal.assigned_empty:
Once a texture is added, the bone hierarchy will be shown on the left.

All bones' assigned textures will be shown here.

atlas_modal.no_pending:
If the imported image is a single texture, simply click 'Done'.

If it's a texture atlas, drag the image or click 'Add Texture' to add a new slice of texture.

The atlas will be discarded once done, and will need to be re-imported to add more textures.

armature_panel.heading: Armature
armature_panel.styles_desc:
Create a style, add textures, then assign bones to use it. Click on styles in the dropdown to toggle them.

Bones use textures based on their index. To change it, select a bone > 'Tex Index'.

Multiple styles can be active at once. Bones assinged to multiple active styles will use the top-most first.
armature_panel.empty_armature:
Don't forget - if in doubt, consult the [User Documentation](user-docs/index.html).

If you're new here, check out the [Starter Guide](user-docs/starter-guide/main.html).

You may import a PSD (File > Import), provided it has the [right structure](user-docs/psd.html).

Click **New Bone** above to get started with your armature.

bone_panel.heading: Bone
bone_panel.name: Name:
bone_panel.bone_empty:
This bone currently has no texture and is an invisible point.

To add a texture to it, assign one via the Textures setup above.

This bone may be dragged in the Armature list, to change its order or to assign it as a child to another bone.

inverse_kinematics.heading: Inverse Kinematics â„¹
inverse_kinematics.desc:
Automatically adjust and bend bones to reach a specified target.
Best used for joints like shoulders and legs.

After the joints have been set up, click the checkbox next to this header to activate IK.
inverse_kinematics.enabled_desc:
Should inverse kinematics be running for this set of joints?

Untick this to allow setting up joint positions and rotations.
inverse_kinematics.effector_desc:
Start: used as base, will only rotate and stay in place

Middle: will rotate and move such that End matches Target

End: all prior effectors will adjust such that this matches Target

Every Middle and End joint must be located towards it's parent's arrow.
inverse_kinematics.constraint_desc:
CC: Clockwise, all Middle effectors will move up/right (ie; legs)

CCW: Counter-clockwise, all Middle effectors will move down/left (ie; shoulders)
inverse_kinematics.cant_edit: Turn off inverse kinematics to edit

mesh_deformation.heading: Mesh Deformation â„¹
mesh_deformation.desc: Turn this texture into a deformable mesh. Vertices can be bound to other bones with custom weights to influence them.
mesh_deformation.pathing_desc: Vertices will follow this bind along a path formed with adjacent binds.
mesh_deformation.no_bound_verts:
Click `Bind Verts` to add vertices to this bind. Click again to stop adding.

Once added, their weights will be configurable here.

polar.delete_bone: Are you sure to delete this bone?

animation.heading: Animation
animation.edit_while_playing_desc:
By default, edits won't be recorded if an animation is playing to prevent accidents.

Tick this allow editing while an animation is playing.

miscellaneous.heading: Miscellaneous
miscellaneous.select_exact_bone: Select exact bone in click â„¹:
miscellaneous.select_exact_bone_desc: Clicking on a bone that is named 'Texture' (any case) will select the parent. Tick this to directly select the texture.
miscellaneous.keep_tex_str: Keep texture name after renaming â„¹:
miscellaneous.keep_tex_str_desc: By default, renaming a texture will also adjust bones using it to change their tex name. Tick this to preserve bone texture names after renaming.

beta.heading: Beta
beta.warning:
*The following options will enable incomplete features.
Please save and backup your project before proceeding.*
beta.nothing: *No beta features as of this version ($version) release! Keep an eye out for new versions at the [Main Site](https://skelform.org).*

keyframe_editor.heading: Animation
keyframe_editor.invalid_fps:
Some keyframes will be lost.

Potential fixes:
- Spread out keyframes
- Incrementally change FPS

polar.delete_bone: Are you sure to delete this bone?
polar.delete_anim: Are you sure to delete this animation?
polar.delete_tex: Are you sure to delete this texture?
polar.delete_style: Are you sure to delete this style?
polar.unsaved:
Are you sure you want to quit and discard unsaved changes?

(Click 'Yes' to confirm)
